channel.title: Php Blogs Internet Sites Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Blogs Internet Sites Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i have a bundle of different sites.
item.description: and I have been thinking about merging them all into one of two sites. making all my personal sites have the same motif. making the blog have categories and importing all the old entries into a nifty category system. I don’t know yet. but I have been looking at some others and I noticed that a lot of them have incredible blogs.. and one of the reasons is you don’t have to jump all over the internet looking for something.
